interestingcomments.content: X-T3 raw files still not supported in macOS? /!/ [In this article](https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT207972?fbclid=IwAR3pBMcF_oGGuUaAuUNdCETo5hZInebnpInNetR3nnYb9ZF_5t7eKgsdOyw) Apple says as of November 26th Fuji X-T3's raw files are supported by macOS High Sierra, but there hasn't been an update newer than 10.13.6 which was released in June 2018. No camera raw updates in the App Store either. Anyone figured this out yet? It's really painful to not be able to see the thumbnails of the raw files in Finder.

No camera raw updates in the App Store either. Anyone figured this out yet? It's really painful to not be able to see the thumbnails of the raw files in Finder.
